column8: TREE DOWN AT JACKSON ISLAND CAMPGROUND. REPORTED BY SHERIFFS OFFICE. (MRX)
MOBILE HOME OFF FOUNDATION. ROOF BLOWN OFF DOUBLE WIDE MOBILE HOME. NUMEROUS TREES DOWN. STORAGE BUILDINGS DESTROYED. ALL IN SAME AREA NORTH OF HIGHWAY 33 NEAR EDGECOME (MHX)
SPOTTER MEASURED 62 MILES AN HOUR. WIND GUST. (RAH)
